Hi there and thanks for reading my personal blog!

My name is Guillaume Dubeaux and I am a postdoctoral fellow at UCSD in sunny SoCal.

I love many different things (and that's not always a great thing 😅). To keep it short, I love Science, Technology and Cooking.
But let’s go straight to the point. I am trying to give some rhythm to my blog in 2020. Let’s organize and plan everything, shall we?

🔬 Monday: Let’s start the week with a Journal Club.

I will select an article that I think relevant for everybody (even non-scientist) to read or at least to be aware of.

I’ve always been in love with science. But to be honest, I only realized during my master that I wanted to be a full-time researcher. To fulfill this goal, I did my PhD at CNRS in the Vert lab working on the molecular mechanisms driving the ubiquitination and endocytosis of the plant metal transporter IRT1. I graduated from Paris-Saclay University in December 2016.
In September 2017, I joined the University of California in San Diego to do a post-doc in Julian Schroeder’s lab. For this postdoc, I am working on CO2 signaling in plants.

🌮 Tuesday: tacos!

In SoCal, Tuesday rhymes with tacos. On that day, no blog post, only Tacos with friends!

But you can follow me on to see my food pics! Just sayin’ 🙂

🍴 Wednesday: all about cooking.

After an epic Taco Tuesday, what’s best than writing something on food and cooking?

Sometimes, I might even write in french. Autour de la Cuisine as we say in 🇫🇷. Better than Duolingo or Rosetta Stone courses, Wednesday will be a good day to pratice your french from now on 😉

🧘‍♂️ Thursday: relaxation after exertion.

Give me a break guys, I cannot write every day!

📱 Friday: technology day!

On Fridays, I will give my opinion on something big related to technology.

Technology is probably my main passion. I am always focused on tech. I live for tech, I dream about tech. You got it? I am a tech nerd.
Because of that, I write about tech, I listen to tech podcasts everyday and of course I read tech news as well.
As a quick anecdote, technology is probably one of the main reason I wanted to live in California. Tech is mostly created there and I wanted to see that with my own eyes...

😎 Saturday and Sunday: productivity. Or video-games 🕹

I used to write “Chroniques” for the famous french tech site MacGeneration.
Nowadays, I plan my week to come or long-term goals during weekends. I use Notion to do so and I will talk a lot about it.

Every other weekend: video-games! Indeed, we recently created a podcast with my awesome Brazilian friend Paulo 🇧🇷. We'll talk about how we reconcile our super busy lives with video-gaming. We are definitely not pros but are trying our best to find time to play even though we don't have plenty of time to do so.
Our show is called GameBros. Stay tuned!

Thanks a lot for reading my blog.

I hope you enjoy it!
